name: remax-backend
description: Backend API for RE/MAX Knowledge Platform

scripts.start: npx prisma migrate deploy && node src/server.js
scripts.start:basic: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npm run db:seed && node src/server.js
scripts.check-config: node -e "console.log('Environment Check:'); console.log('DATABASE_URL:', process.env.DATABASE_URL ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing'); console.log('JWT_SECRET:', process.env.JWT_SECRET ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing'); console.log('CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing'); console.log('CLOUDINARY_API_KEY:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_KEY ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing'); console.log('CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing');"

author: RE/MAX Argentina
